contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!--See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields that may be available and descriptions of usage--> <!-- Basic info ----------------> |name = Zanzibar Urban/West Region |other_name = |settlement_type = [[Regions of Tanzania|Region]] <!-- images and maps -----------> |pushpin_map = Tanzania<!-- the name of a location map as per http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:Location_map --> |pushpin_label_position =bottom |pushpin_mapsize =300 |pushpin_map_caption =Location in Tanzania <!-- Location ------------------> |coordinates_region = TZ |coordinates_type = type:adm1st |coordinates_display = inline,title |latd=06|latm= 10|lats= |latNS=S |longd=039|longm= 15|longs= |longEW=E |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Tanzania]] |subdivision_type1 = |subdivision_name1 = <!-- Population -----------------------> |population_as_of = 2002 |population_total = 391002 |blank_name = [[Unique Feature Identifier|UFI]] |blank_info = -2574830 }} '''Zanzibar Urban/West Region'''<ref>{{GEOnet2|32FA88191DED3774E0440003BA962ED3|Zanzibar Urban/West Region (Approved)}}, [[National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency|United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency]]</ref> is one of the thirty [[Regions of Tanzania|regions]] of [[Tanzania]]. Located on the island of [[Unguja]], [[Zanzibar City]] serves as the region's capital. According to the 2002 Tanzania National Census, the population of the Zanzibar Urban/West Region was 391,002.<ref name="Census-2002-Zanzibar-U">{{Cite web|url=http://www.tanzania.go.tz/census/census/urban_west.htm|title=2002 Population and Housing General Report: Urban West|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20040318024912/http://www.tanzania.go.tz/census/census/urban_west.htm|archivedate=18 March 2004|deadurl=yes}}</ref> ==Administrative divisions== ===Constituencies=== For parliamentary elections, Tanzania is divided into constituencies. As of the 2010 elections Zanzibar Urban/West Region had nineteen constituencies:<ref>{{Cite web|title=Organisations located in Zanzibar City - Tanzania|publisher=African Development Information|url=http://www.afdevinfo.com/htmlreports/lor/lor_2149.html}}</ref> * Amani Constituency (Urban) * Bububu Constituency (West) * Chumbuni Constituency (Urban) * Dimani Constituency (West) * Dole Constituency (West) * Fuoni Constituency (West) * Jang'ombe Constituency (Urban) * Kiembesamaki Constituency (West) * Kikwajuni Constituency (Urban) * Kwahani Constituency (Urban) * Kwamtipura Constituency (Urban) * Magogoni Constituency (West) * Magomeni Constituency (Urban) * Mfenesini Constituency (West) * Mji Mkongwe Constituency (Urban) * Mpendae Constituency (Urban) * Mtoni Constituency (West) * Mwanakwerekwe Constituency (West) * Raha Leo Constituency (Urban) ===Districts=== The Zanzibar West/Urban Region comprises the [[Zanzibar Urban District]] and the [[Zanzibar West District]].<ref name="Census-2002-Zanzibar-U" /> Zanzibar Urban District is co-extensive with Zanzibar City. ==Notes== {{Reflist}} {{-}} {{Districts of Zanzibar West}} {{Regions of Tanzania}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zanzibar Urban West Region}} [[Category:Regions of Tanzania]] [[Category:Zanzibar Urban/West Region| ]] {{Zanzibar-geo-stub}}
